title: 4-second lag and crash.
content:
Since I last posted here, the lag when opening Settings on both my XL 3 and XL 2 is now around 4 seconds.
Also, on both 'phones, when Settings eventually opens, if I tap the Search box at the top, Settings crashes.
I've sent feedback on both 'phones. This is extremely irritating.

Note: It is exactly the same after a restart and in Safe mode.
